cards.title: Miss Militia
powers: Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put any revealed Weapon cards into play and discard the rest. You may use a power on a Weapon card now.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero target deals 1 target 2 projectile damage.
One hero destroys one of their Equipment cards. If they do, they deal 1 target 4 projectile damage.
One player may play a card.

cards.title: Armour
body: If {MissMilitiaCharacter} would be dealt 5 or more damage from a single source, prevent that damage and destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: She'd grown to love{BR}this country. Truly love it, for what{BR}it stood for. She'd had to fight to wear{BR}the flag as part of her costume.

cards.title: Cover Fire
body: {MissMilitiaCharacter} deals a non-hero target 2 projectile damage. 1 hero target regains 2 HP.
cards.flavorText: A red dot appeared on{BR}the tendril that gripped her. Another{BR}distant gunshot, and it was severed. Ooze{BR}splashed onto the rooftop.

cards.title: Grenade
body: {MissMilitiaCharacter} deals a non-hero target 2 fire damage and 2 melee damage. If she dealt damage this way, you may destroy an Ongoing card.
cards.flavorText: Miss Militia was climbing up out{BR}of the lead truck's passenger door in{BR}an instant, hefting a grenade launcher to{BR}blast Menja.

cards.title: Hail of Bullets
body: {MissMilitiaCharacter} deals each non-hero target 2 projectile damage.
cards.flavorText: She unloaded clip after clip into{BR}the enemy ranks; rubber bullets, most{BR}likely.

cards.title: I Don't Sleep
body: At the end of your turn, draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: I don't sleep.{BR}Not really,{BR}since I got my powers

cards.title: I Have More
body: Destroy a Weapon card. Destroy up to 2 Ongoing and/or environment cards.
cards.flavorText: She could reform the gun in{BR}a second if a gun jammed.

cards.title: Machete
powers: Until the end of your next turn activate [b]Machete[/b] effects{BR}{MissMilitiaCharacter} deals a non-hero target 2 melee damage.{BR}[b]SMG[/b]: {MissMilitiaCharacter} deals that target 3 melee damage.
cards.flavorText: Regent stopped his{BR}struggles the second she rested{BR}the point of the bladed weapon against{BR}the side of his throat.

cards.title: Nonlethal Measures
body: Whenever {MissMilitiaCharacter} destroys a non-character card target, you may put that target on the bottom of its deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Taylor!{BR}I'm not going to shoot,{BR}but you have to stop!

cards.title: Overdrive
body: Count the number of your unique Weapon cards in play. You may use that many powers this turn.
At the end of this turn, destroy each Weapon card whose power you used this turn.
cards.flavorText: Miss Militia stepped up to the plate,{BR}a cape flanking her. Her power, to create{BR}the bomb. Ten and a half feet long.

cards.title: Pistol
powers: Until the end of your next turn activate [b]Pistol[/b] effects{BR}{MissMilitiaCharacter} deals a non-hero target 2 projectile damage.{BR}[b]SMG:[/b] you may play a card.
cards.flavorText: Her hand automatically closed around{BR}it, feeling the warmth of it. It felt almost{BR}like when she pet a friendly dog.

cards.title: Sniper Rifle
powers: Until the end of your next turn activate [b]Sniper[/b] effects{BR}Discard a card. Select a target. At the start of your next turn, {MissMilitiaCharacter} deals that target 4 projectile damage.{BR}[b]Pistol[/b]: draw 3 cards.
cards.flavorText: Miss Militia turned a sniper rifle{BR}on me. I caught her before she could{BR}fire.

cards.title: Submachine Gun
powers: Until the end of your next turn activate [b]SMG[/b] effects{BR}{MissMilitiaCharacter} deals up to 3 non-hero targets 1 projectile damage each.{BR}[b]Machete[/b]: you may destroy an Ongoing or environment card.{BR}[b]Sniper[/b]: you may put a non-hero non-character target in play on top of its deck.
cards.flavorText: She'd killed the{BR}soldiers that held the other children{BR}of her village hostage. After the first,{BR}she had feigned fear... then...

cards.title: Weaponry
body: [b]SMG[/b]: Increase damage dealt by {MissMilitiaCharacter} this turn by 1.
[b]Machete[/b]: {MissMilitiaCharacter} may deal a non-hero target 1 irreducible melee damage.
[b]Sniper[/b]: You may destroy a non-character card non-hero target.
cards.flavorText: She harbored her suspicions about{BR}her gift: her powers had taken a part of{BR}her psyche and given it concrete form.

promoCards.title: Miss Militia
powers: You may use a power on a Weapon card, activating [b]Pistol[/b], [b]Machete[/b], [b]Sniper[/b] and [b]SMG[/b] effects. Return that card to your hand. You may play a Weapon card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power.
One hero deals 1 target 2 melee damage.
